abstracts.cdata!:
The Urban Construction Project will
            assist the Government in its reconstruction efforts
            following the recent civil war. It is designed to address
            emergency urban problems, to have a substantial employment
            and income generation impact, and to be implemented so that
            disbursements will be completed within 18 months. The
            project will: (a) meet immediate physical reconstruction
            needs in six heavily damaged cities; (b) provide financing
            for the rehabilitation of the small-scale
            commercial/industrial sector in the cities affected by the
            war; and (c) assist in alleviating the severe shortage of
            public transport in Managua. Specifically the proposed
            components are: municipal reconstruction, credits for
            rehabilitation of small-scale enterprises, and
            rehabilitation of Managua's public transport system.
